entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
